metadata.text1:
Postition airway & suction
If sats < 90% in air put on oxygen
If > 1 kg consider CPAP according to TRY algorithm
metadata.text2:
If breathing 60-80 bpm use cup/NGT
If needing CPAP use OGT
If breathing > 80bpm consider IV fluids
metadata.text3: Before commencing antibiotics consider sepsis screen
